00002 class Url extends sModel {
00003         function tinyFromUrl($url){
00004                 $q = new sQuery();
00005                 $q->from('urls');
00006                 $q->addWhere('url', $url, '=');
00007                 $q->setLimit(1);
00008                 $result = $q->selectRow();
00009                 //that was equivalent to:
00010                 //SELECT `url` FROM `urls` WHERE `url` = '$url' LIMIT 1
00011                 if($result){
00012                         $result = $result['tiny_url'];
00013                 }
00014                 return $result;
00015         }
00016         function newTinyUrl($tinyUrl, $url){

00018                 $q->from('urls');
00019                 $q->addField('tiny_url', $tinyUrl);

00021                 return $q->insert();

00027                 $q = new sQuery();
00028                 $q->from('urls');
00029                 $q->addWhere('tiny_url', $tinyUrl);
00030                 $result = $q->selectRow();
00031                 //that was equivalent to:
00032                 //SELECT tiny_url FROM urls WHERE tiny_url = 'tinyUrl' LIMIT 1;

00034                         $result = $result['url'];

00039                 $q = new sQuery();
00040                 $q->from('urls');
00041                 $result = $q->selectAll();
